Activity: Arrive at the office. Review overnight market activity. Check emails.
Review feedback from Quantitative Researchers on the initial fund strategy document.

Meet with @comp-1 to discuss the risk management framework of the fund. Focus on key risk metrics and how they will be monitored and managed. @PEOPLE: comp-1 Topic: Risk Management Framework Discussion
Review existing risk management policies and procedures. Identify areas for improvement and update the framework to reflect current market conditions and regulatory requirements.
Lunch break. Review Wall Street Journal.
Contact @audit-1 to discuss the regulatory requirements for the fund. @PEOPLE: audit-1 Topic: Regulatory Requirements for Fund.
Contact @devops-1 for system support during the registration. @PEOPLE: devops-1 Topic: System support for registration
Revise the risk management framework with inputs from compliance and audit, ensuring all regulatory requirements are addressed.

Final review of the risk management framework and send the updated version to the compliance officer and project manager for final approval. @PEOPLE: comp-1, pm-1 Topic: Final Risk Management Framework Review
